name: One Punch Man: Road to Hero
summary:
《One Punch Man: Road to Hero》 is almost ready to meet its Heroes! 
The monsters are growing, and the Heroes are ready for action! 
Quickly, sound the alarm against the monsters! Are you ready to defend the city? 
Official IP! 
Faithful to the original, with georgeous battles and following the original plot! 
Many popular heroes and monsters take to the stage! Build a powerful team out of your favorites! 
 
Electric Battles! 
Watch beautiful effects and stunning skills in amazing strategic battles! 
Superpowers, machines, weapons - Create the ultimate fighting combo! 
 
Many Game Modes! 
Original Plot Line Map, players can move between cities fighting monsters and growing stronger! 
Challenge the House of Evolution, and grow your team; 
Prove your strength against other players in the Zenira Arena!
